info.name: Geocaching.com - Dark Theme
info.description:
A dark theme for the Geocaching.com website, as well as a few other related websites (GeoCheck.org and GeoChecker.com).  Colors are changeable via the variables set on :root.

Any issues?  Additional websites to add?  Want to check out my other dark theme styles?  Let me know by contacting me through my social media (and please provide a screenshot if possible): https://www.queengoob.org/darkthemes

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("geocaching.com"), domain("geocheck.org"), domain("geochecker.com"), domain("certitudes.org"), domain("pathtags.com") {
:root {
    --background: #181818;
    --background-2: #202020;
    --background-3: #303030;
    --background-4: black;
    --background-cache-button-selected: #505050;
    --background-alert: #0c1827;
    --background-alert-success: #1a3659;
    --foreground: #ccc;
    --foreground-2: white;
    --foreground-disabled: #828282;
    --foreground-invert: black;
    --main: #02874d;
    --main-dark: #0a1f15;
    --error: #ec0404;
    --warn: #baba03;
    --link: #3d76c5;
    --link-hover: #5997ed;
    --link-visited: #a565e2;
    --border: #969696;
    --border-input: 1px solid #696969;
    --table-header: #3b311b;
    --table-border: #696969;
    --table-background: #292929;
    --table-background-alt: #393939;
}

html,
body {
    background-color: var(--background);
    color: var(--foreground);
}

a {
    color: var(--link);
}

a:hover {
    color: var(--link-hover);
}

a:visited {
    color: var(--link-visited);
}

input,
textarea,
.gc-textfield input,
.gc-textfield textarea,
input[type="number"],
input[type="password"],
input[type="text"],
textarea.decorated,
input[type="email"],
.search-field .typeahead-query,
.search-field input[type="search"],
.search-field input[type="text"],
.typeahead-result > ul,
.selectize-input,
.selectize-control .selectize-input,
.selectize-control.single .selectize-input.input-active,
.cke .cke_combo_button,
.cke .cke_combo_on a.cke_combo_button,
.cke .cke_combo_off a.cke_combo_button:hover,
.cke .cke_combo_off a.cke_combo_button:focus,
.cke .cke_combo_off a.cke_combo_button:active,
.cke .cke_button.cke_button__source.cke_button_off,
.cke .cke_button.cke_button__source.cke_button_on:hover,
.cke .cke_button.cke_button__source.cke_button_on:focus,
.cke .cke_button.cke_button__source.cke_button_on:active,
.toolbar select,
.filters-toggle .btn-show,
#inputArea input[type="text"],
#inputArea input[type="text"]:focus {
    color: var(--foreground);
    background-color: var(--background);
    border: var(--border-input);
    border-radius: 4px;
}

input[type="number"][disabled],
input[type="password"][disabled],
input[type="text"][disabled],
textarea[disabled].decorated,
input[type="email"][disabled] {
    background-color: var(--background-2);
    color: var(--foreground-disabled);
}

button {
    background-color: var(--background);
    color: var(--foreground);
}

button:hover {
    background-color: var(--background-2);
    color: var(--foreground);
}

select {
    background: var(--background) url('data:image/png;base64,') no-repeat 100% 45%;
    color: var(--foreground);
    border: var(--border-input);
}
}

.search-results-table tr.disabled td,
.conversation-panel .activity-item.disabled,
.dt-info .locked-treasure,
.zoom-control button:disabled {
    background: var(--background-4);
    border-color: var(--background-2);
}

.search-bar .filter-toggle,
.zoom-control button:focus, .zoom-control button:active {
    background: var(--background-2) !important;
    color: var(--foreground) !important;
}

.cache-attributes li button,
#attribute-filter-group ul.cache-attributes li button {
    color: var(--background-4);
}

.cache-attributes li button.marked,
#attribute-filter-group ul.cache-attributes li button.marked {
    color: var(--background-cache-button-selected);
}

    background: var(--background-alert);
    color: var(--foreground);
}

.alert.alert-success {

}

    background-color: var(--background);

}

}

}

.delete-list-cta {
    color: var(--error) !important;
}

.clickable-table-header.disabled,
.old-price,
.old.price,
.data.switch .counter,
.product-item .price-box .price-label {
    color: var(--foreground-disabled);
}

.cssfilters .pop-modal.sit-right:before,
.cssfilters .pop-modal.sit-right:after {
    border-right-color: var(--background-2);
}

.products-grid .product-item-inner,
.products-grid .product-item-inner:before {
    background: var(--background-3) !important;
}

#cpTextContent,
.LinkField .button,
.LinkField input,
.page-header .panel.wrapper,
.reveal-modal.search-filters .checkbox-segments,
.reveal-modal.search-filters .checkbox-segments .checkbox,
.reveal-modal.search-filters .status-segments .checkbox,
#search-filters .search-filter-group label,
#search-filters .search-filter-group ul {
    border-color: transparent;
}

hr,
.hide-page-section,
.hide-page-aside,
.flatpickr-calendar.open,
.LogTrackablesTable tr.TableFooter td,
.sidebar-toggle,
.selected-filters .btn,
.cache-preview-header,
.cache-preview-attributes .geocache-owner,
.cache-activity-log,
.cache-preview-activities > header,
.marker-label {
    border-color: var(--border);
}


.hide-page-aside select,
.gc-add-to-list .create-new-list-form-section {
    border-color: var(--border-input);
}

.HowToVolunteer .Banner {
    background-color: var(--background-2);
}

.Note {
    background-color: var(--background-4);
}

.Disclaimer {
    background-color: var(--table-header);
}

.gc-checkbox {
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px black;
}

.gc-labeled-radio-input input[type=radio] + i,
.gc-toggle,
.gc-toggle::after,
.gc-checkbox input + span::before,
.checkbox input + span::before,
.checkbox span:before,
.radio span:before,
.toggle-handle:after,
.noUi-handle,
.gc-radio-control i,
.rc-slider-handle {
    background-color: var(--background-3);
}

.gc-toggle:hover::after,
.checkbox:hover span:before,
.checkbox input[type="checkbox"]:focus~span:before,
.radio:hover input[type="radio"]+span:before,
.radio input[type="radio"]:focus+span:before,
.toggle-handle:hover::after, .toggle-handle:focus::after,
.noUi-handle,
.checkbox,
.checkbox:hover,
#search-filters .checkbox,
#search-filters .checkbox:hover,
.gc-radio-control:hover i {
    box-shadow: none;
}

.reveal-modal.search-filters .modal-body .segmented-control .checkbox input[type='checkbox']:checked + .label,
.reveal-modal.search-filters .modal-body .segmented-control .checkbox input[type='checkbox']:checked:focus + .label {
    background: var(--main) !important;
    color: var(--foreground-2) !important;
}

.reveal-modal.search-filters .modal-body .segmented-control .checkbox input[type='checkbox'] + .label,
.reveal-modal.search-filters .modal-body .segmented-control .checkbox input[type='checkbox']:focus + .label {
    background: var(--background-2) !important;
    color: var(--foreground) !important;
}

table.Table {
    border-color: var(--table-border);
}

table.Table th,
td.TableHeader,
th.TableHeader,
table.Table tfoot td,
.PublicProfile table.Table tfoot td,
.ProfileStats table.Table th,
.ProfileStats table.Table tfoot td {
    background-color: var(--table-header);
    border-color: var(--table-border);
}

table.Table td,
.TrackableItemLogTable .travel-log-table-header {
    background-color: var(--table-background);
    color: var(--foreground);
    border-color: var(--table-border);
}

table.Table tr.AlternatingRow td,
table.Table tr td.AlternatingRow,
#TrackableDetails ~ table.TrackableItemLogTable tr.AlternatingRow,
#TrackableDetails ~ table.Table tr.AlternatingRow td,
#TrackableDetails ~ table.TrackableItemLogTable tr.AlternatingRow .travel-log-table-header,
#TrackableDetails ~ table.Table tr.AlternatingRow td .travel-log-table-header,
table.Table tr.TertiaryRow td,
.TertiaryRow,
table.Table tr td.TertiaryRow {
    background-color: var(--table-background-alt);
    border-color: var(--table-border);
}

.flatpickr-day.disabled,
.flatpickr-day.disabled:hover,
.flatpickr-day.nextMonthDay,
.flatpickr-day.notAllowed,
.flatpickr-day.notAllowed.nextMonthDay,
.flatpickr-day.notAllowed.prevMonthDay,
.flatpickr-day.prevMonthDay,
.filter-options-content .count,
.opc-block-summary .mark .value {
    color: var(--foreground-disabled);
}

.user-typeahead-list {
    box-shadow: 0 0 13px black;
}

span.favorite-rank {
    background-color: hsl(216, 95%, 46%);
}

span.favorite-rank[title="0"] {
    background-color: hsl(216, 95%, 26%);
}

.LogsTable,
.ui-widget-header,
.hero .backdrop,
.noUi-target {
    background-color: transparent;
}

.pagination-controls .pagination-control:hover,
.cache-preview-attributes .attribute-box {
    color: var(--main);
}

.gc-gauge,
.list-favorites .section-meta .favorites-meta-progress .gc-gauge,
.page-footer,
.marker-label,
.cache-preview-attributes .attribute-box {
    background-color: var(--main-dark);
}

img[src="/images/attributes/attribute-blank.png"] {
    display: none;
}

.zoom-control button:disabled {
    filter: grayscale(1);
}

#fancybox-outer,
.fancybox-title-inside {
    background: var(--background-2);
    color: var(--foreground);
}

#fancybox-content {
    border-color: var(--background-2);
}

#fancybox-overlay {
    background: var(--background-4) !important;
}

.pagination .current.prev,
.pagination .current.next {
    background: var(--background-4);
}

.pagination .current {
    background: var(--main-dark);
}

.pagination a,
.pagination .current,
.opc-progress-bar-item._active > span:after,
.noUi-target {
    border-color: var(--main);
}

.opc-progress-bar-item:before,
.opc-progress-bar-item > span:before,
.opc-progress-bar-item > span:after {
    border-color: var(--background-3);
}

.pop-modal.sit-left:after,
.cssfilters .pop-modal.sit-left:before {
    border-left-color: var(--background-2);
}

font[color="white"] {
    color: var(--background);
}

font[color="black"],
*[style*="color:#000000"]
*[style*="color: #000000"],
*[style*="color:black"]
*[style*="color: black"] {
    color: var(--foreground-2);
}

*[style*="background-color:#FFFF00"],
*[style*="background-color: #FFFF00"] {
    color: var(--foreground-invert);
}

.widget.block.block-static-block span[style*="color: #000000"] {
    color: var(--foreground) !important;
}

/* Image Replacement */
/* - General Images */
.btn-settings,
.close-reveal-modal,
.menu a svg,
.menu form svg,
.message__owner svg,
.flatpickr-next-month,
.flatpickr-prev-month,
.icon-svg-fill.charcoal,
.icon-svg-fill.tempest,
img[src="/account/app/ui-icons/icons/global/gps.svg"],
.feature-list .feature-box svg,
.pq-legend li img,
.drafts-empty .media-left img,
.cke .cke_button_off:not(.cke_button__source) .cke_button_icon:not(:hover),
.cke .cke_button_disabled:not(.cke_button__source) .cke_button_icon,
.treasure-filter-tool-tip,
.cache-attributes-filter-tool-tip,
.responsive-table-menu button.toggle:not(:hover)::after,
.search-results-table th.sort-column.sort-asc a:after, .search-results-table th.sort-column.sort-desc a:after,
.-sort-asc div::after,
.-sort-desc div::after,
#pnlLazyLoad img {
    filter: invert(100%);
}

@-moz-document domain("geocheck.org") {
/* -=- GeoCheck.org Styling -=- */
a,
a:visited {
    color: var(--foreground-2);
}

td.sidebar_light a,
td.sidebar_light a:visited,
td.sidebar_dark a,
td.sidebar_dark a:visited {
    color: black;
}

table.geomain {
    background: var(--background);
}

td.attemptnorm {
    color: var(--foreground);
}

td.attemptyellow {
    color: var(--warn);
}
}

@-moz-document domain("geochecker.com") {
/* -=- GeoChecker.com Styling -=- */
.outertable,
[bgcolor="#FFFFFF"] {
    background-color: var(--background);
}

[style*="color:#000000"] {
    color: var(--foreground-2) !important;
}

.head1 {
    color: var(--foreground-2);
}

.input-requirements {
    background-color: var(--background-2) !important;
    color: var(--foreground);
}
}

@-moz-document domain("certitudes.org") {
/* -=- Certitude Styling -=- */
table#rk, #inputArea {
    background: var(--main-dark);
    color: var(--foreground);
}

#inputArea {
    border-color: var(--border);
}

a.bookmark {
    background: var(--background-2);
}

#inputArea input[type="text"] {
    background-image: none;
}
}

@-moz-document domain("pathtags.com") {
/* -=- PathTags.com Styling -=- */
#mainarea,
#content {
    background: var(--background);
    color: var(--foreground);
}

#plugs .plugblock,
#plugs .plugblockwide {
    color: var(--foreground);
}

.roundborder {
    background: var(--background-2);
    border-color: var(--background-2);
    ;
}

#navzone,
#footer,
#bugs {
    background: var(--main-dark);
}

.buttons.yellowback a,
.yellowback a:hover {
    background-color: var(--main-dark) !important;
}

.buttons a,
.buttons button {
    background-color: var(--background-3) !important;
    border-color: var(--border);
    color: var(--foreground-2);
}

.buttons a:hover,
.buttons button:hover {
    color: var(--link);
}

h3,
#plugs h4.title {
    color: var(--main);
}

.boldnav2:hover {
    color: var(--link-hover);
}
}
